author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangzhou Yuexiu Financial Holdings Group unit issues super short-term financing notes worth totaling 1.2 bln yuan
text:
April 19(Reuters) - Guangzhou Yuexiu Financial Holdings Group Co Ltd
* Says coâ€™s Guangzhou-based financial leasing unit issued 2018 first tranche super short-term financing notes worth 600 million yuan, with term of 270 days
* Says unit issued 2018 second tranche super short-term financing notes worth 600 million yuan, with term of 270 days
